insert_course.prefix: INSERT INTO COURSE (CODE, NAME, SUBJECT, DESCRIPTION) VALUES

insert_class.prefix: WITH ins (course_code, year, semester, prof) AS ( VALUES
insert_class.postfix: ) INSERT INTO CLASS (COURSE_ID, YEAR, SEMESTER, PROF) SELECT COURSE.id, ins.year, ins.semester, ins.prof FROM COURSE join ins ON ins.course_code = COURSE.code;
